document_data.mainbody:
he Most Transcendent Affiliation of Paradisiacal Pens was an association of bonded scribes devoted to Amaunator, the Keeper of the Eternal Sun.
Members of this group were usually quite aloof and cocky. They traveled Faer√ªn preaching the holy word of law and order. Their goal was to construct many large stone amphitheaters dedicated to preserving the law in the form of books and scrolls from every land they visited.
